complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement S1 Operations - Variety Absorption Layer
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down S1 Operations implementation into: variety absorption algorithms, V1 Memory Tiering integration, dynamic GenServer spawning, MCP Gateway integration, EventBus routing, variety measurement, state management, and supervision setup
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to implementing core VSM principles, multiple integrations with existing systems, and requiring deep understanding of cybernetic variety absorption concepts

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose S2 Coordination into: anti-oscillation algorithms, damping mechanisms, resource contention resolution, oscillation pattern detection, coordination rules engine, V1 Workflows integration, state machine implementation, and monitoring setup
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex coordination logic requiring advanced algorithms, machine learning integration, and dependency on S1 implementation

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement S3 Control - Resource Optimization Layer
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split S3 Control into: resource bargaining algorithms, V1 Workflows Engine integration, Kalman filter implementation, audit subsystem (S3*), reinforcement learning setup, performance target management, decision trees, and emergency protocols
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving advanced algorithms (Kalman filters, RL), predictive analytics, and sophisticated resource management requiring S1/S2 dependencies

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down Algedonic System into: pain signal routing with <100ms guarantee, pleasure signal mechanisms, signal filtering, algedonic memory, VSM integration points, priority queue processing, real-time monitoring, and signal correlation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity due to strict performance requirements (<100ms) and system-wide integration, but conceptually more straightforward than S1-S3

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose S4 Intelligence into: environmental scanning algorithms, V1 Intelligence.LLM integration, CRDT BeliefSet connection, pattern extraction, scenario modeling, cross-domain learning, change detection, and predictive analytics
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving AI/ML integration, distributed systems (CRDT), and sophisticated pattern recognition requiring S1-S3 operational data

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement S5 Policy - Identity and Governance
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split S5 Policy into: identity management, value system with constraints, strategic goal setting, ethical boundary enforcement, system constitution, viability assessment, conflict resolution, and strategic oversight
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity involving philosophical concepts (identity, ethics) but fewer technical integrations compared to lower-level systems

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down control loop integration into: S1→S2→S3→S4→S5 connections, variety attenuation mechanisms, variety amplification, homeostatic regulation, emergency overrides, stability monitoring, performance optimization, and timing synchronization
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity as it requires all previous systems (S1-S5) to be complete and involves sophisticated cybernetic control theory implementation

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose VSM observability into: variety flow measurement, Grafana dashboard creation, health indicators, control loop metrics, algedonic analytics, viability scoring, performance benchmarking, and automated alerting
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving monitoring and visualization but dependent on having VSM systems operational for meaningful metrics collection

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split performance optimization into: variety absorption rate tuning, algedonic latency optimization, memory usage optimization, CPU balancing, database query optimization, EventBus routing optimization, GC tuning, and capacity planning
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity requiring performance engineering expertise and complete VSM system for realistic optimization

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down integration testing into: end-to-end S1-S5 testing, self-regulation validation, stability testing, V1 integration validation, failure scenario testing, regression test suite, cybernetic compliance verification, and production readiness assessment
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity requiring comprehensive test strategy design, behavioral validation of complex cybernetic principles, and coordination of all VSM components
